title: The Latest: Far-right Hungarian mayor warns migrants away
content:
Topix   ›     Travel   ›    The Latest: Far-right Hungarian mayor...         
The latest developments as European governments rush to cope with the huge number of people moving across Europe. All times local : Laszlo Toroczkai, the mayor of Asotthalom, has put out a short video warning asylum-seekers to stay out of his village of 4,000. 
 
Start the conversation, or Read more at The Gazette.
